mapper.insert: INSERT into knowlg_content (id, title, `desc`, content, type_id, state, read_num, `label`, create_id, create_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{desc}, #{content}, #{typeId}, #{state}, #{readNum}, #{label}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.type_id typeId, a.`label`, c.`name` typeName, a.content FROM knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type c ON a.type_id = c.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.content, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN '审核中' WHEN '2' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '3' THEN '审核不通过' END state, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN 'state-new' WHEN '2' THEN 'state-up' WHEN '3' THEN 'state-down' END colorClass, a.`label`, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.read_num readNum, c.`name` typeName FROM knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type c ON a.type_id = c.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.typeName, a.createTime, a.createUser FROM (SELECT a.id, a.title, a.type_id, c.`name` typeName, a.create_time, date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i') createTime, b.user_name createUser FROM sys_eve_user_staff b, knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type c ON a.type_id = c.id WHERE a.state = '1' AND a.create_id = b.user_id) a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.title LIKE '%${title}%'
AND a.type_id = #{typeId}
AND a.createUser like '%${createUser}%'
AND a.create_time >= #{startTime} AND #{endTime} >= a.create_time
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
SELECT a.id, a.title, a.`label`, c.`name` typeName, a.content FROM knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type c ON a.type_id = c.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT a.id, a.title, c.`name` typeName, a.type_id, e.user_name createUser, date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i') createTime, b.user_name examineUser, a.create_time, a.examine_time, date_format(a.examine_time,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i') examineTime, a.state FROM knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type c ON a.type_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff e ON e.user_id = a.create_id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON b.user_id = a.examine_id WHERE a.state != '1') a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.title LIKE '%${title}%'
AND a.state = #{state}
AND a.type_id = #{typeId}
AND a.createUser like '%${createUser}%'
AND a.create_time >= #{startTime} AND #{endTime} >= a.create_time
AND a.examine_time >= #{examineStartTime} AND #{examineEndTime} >= a.examine_time
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT a.id, a.title, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN '审核中' WHEN '2' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '3' THEN '审核不通过' END state, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN 'state-new' WHEN '2' THEN 'state-up' WHEN '3' THEN 'state-down' END colorClass, c.`name` typeName, a.`label`, a.content, b.user_name createName, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i') createTime FROM sys_eve_user_staff b, knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type c ON a.type_id = c.id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND b.user_id = a.create_id

SELECT a.id, a.title, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN '审核中' WHEN '2' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '3' THEN '审核不通过' END state, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN 'state-new' WHEN '2' THEN 'state-up' WHEN '3' THEN 'state-down' END colorClass, c.`name` typeName, a.content, a.`label`, a.examine_nopass_reason examineNopassReason, e.user_name examineName, DATE_FORMAT(a.examine_time,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i') examineTime, a.read_num readNum, b.user_name createName, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i') createTime FROM knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type c ON a.type_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff e ON e.user_id = a.create_id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON b.user_id = a.examine_id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.title, c.`name` typeName, a.`label`, b.user_name createName, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') createTime FROM knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON b.user_id = a.create_id LEFT JOIN knowlg_type c ON a.type_id = c.id WHERE a.state = '2'
AND a.title LIKE '%${title}%'
AND a.`label` LIKE '%${label}%'
AND a.type_id = #{typeId}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
